Sentencas: Global climate challenges necessitate the development of technologies that reduce civilization's dependence on non-renewable resources.
Titulo: Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Achieves 70000 Hours of Continuous Operation

Sentencas: Very promising in this respect are solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Achieves 70000 Hours of Continuous Operation

Sentencas: However, their high operating temperatures have imposed a variety of practical limitations, and therefore a major focus in recent years has been on new materials and optimized microstructures.
Titulo: Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Achieves 70000 Hours of Continuous Operation

Sentencas: Here, we report the results of a long-term test using a short stack with anode-supported cells based on standard materials, and we attained a continuous operation time of 70000h (eightyears)the longest operation time ever reached for this technology.
Titulo: Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Achieves 70000 Hours of Continuous Operation

Sentencas: This result offers the best prospect for the realization of stable and robust SOFC technology.
Titulo: Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Achieves 70000 Hours of Continuous Operation
